name: 'Project Abyss' - Beta DEMO
description:
Title: 'Project Abyss'

Version: Beta 1.0 

__________________________________________

Build Notes:
- This is the Beta Build of our game. It includes a list of improvements and additions, including:
* Sub Movement refined
* Camera Issues have been addressed
* Loading into Scenes allow proper oxygen levels
* Sub Tool Pickups have been added
* Enemy AI has been modified
* Gravity GUN has been fixed so only 1 Object can be grabbed
* Temple Entrance completed changed
* First Person Controls have been updated
* Game Over Screen Bug fixed
* etc.
___________________________________________

--------------------------------------------------
SUB CONTROLS:  PC
--------------------------------------------------

Turn Left/Right        -   A/D or Left/Right ARROW

Move Forward/Backward  -   W/S or Up/Down ARROW

Raise SUB              -   SPACE Bar

Lower SUB              -   LEFT 'SHIFT' Key OR Mouse SCROLL Wheel [Click Down]

Switch SUB Tools       -   Right Mouse

Use Equipped SUB Tool  -   Left Mouse

CAMERA CONTROLS:

Switch Camera          -   Press 'C'

First Person AIM       -   Mouse Track Pad (while in First Person)

OTHER CONTROLS:

Pause Game             -   Press 'P'

         

--------------------------------------------------
SUB CONTROLS:  XBOX GamePad
--------------------------------------------------

Turn Left/Right        -   Left/Right Left Joystick

Move Forward/Backward  -   Up/Down Left JoyStick

Raise SUB              -   Right Trigger

Lower SUB              -   Left Trigger

Switch SUB Tools       -   'B' Button

Use Equipped SUB Tool  -   'A' Button

CAMERA CONTROLS:

Switch Camera          -   'Y' Button

First Person AIM       -   Right JoyStick (while in First Person)

OTHER CONTROLS:

Pause Game             -   Press 'Options' Or 'Start'
